alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Northwestern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southeastern Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 15 at 4:38AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Travel challenges continue into the mid-morning hours... Overnight snow showers have left some roadways across central and northeastern NV covered with either snow or slush. By mid-morning most snow or slush should be melted. Light snow showers with little to no additional accumulation are expected this morning and afternoon. Additionally, areas that received precipitation overnight may experience fog and reduced visibilities through the mid-morning hours. Travelers are urged to use extra caution this morning. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
